product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: My husband has a billion tools and already had a smaller all-in-one Craftsman tool set. He has a zillion loose tools but nothing this large all in one carrying case. We had never heard of the Denali name in tools but turns out it is an Amazon brand, intended as a higher quality line than Amazon Basics products.I ordered the 170 piece set. It comes in a sturdy fold-open case with wrenches and sockets in the middle and the rest (pliers, extensions, ratchets, screwdrivers, hex wrenches, etc) in the outer folding sides. All of the pieces snap into the case and stay put well (in fact, if anything it is harder to get them out, they won’t come cropping out on their own). The case is quite heavy when loaded up but it feels sturdy and durable.The quality of the tools is good for a typical homeowner to use for automotive or general household purposes.What we like about this set:- You get a lot of tools for the price, in both standard and metric sets.- They seem to be the same quality as the Craftsman set pieces: sturdy and looks like they will be durable.- I like that many of these tools have 12 point sockets, not all tools do. The more points, the easier it is to line up and grip onto a bolt.- The plastic tools (screwdrivers, pliers, crescent wrench) all have good grips.There are two things that I don’t love as much:- The combination wrenches are all just plain, non-ratcheting. I would have rather that these were ratcheting, We would pay a few dollars more for that.- The ratchets are smooth rather than having a diamond grip etched into the handle. It makes them more slippery / less easy to hold and use.Overall, this set is a good surprise offering from Amazon. Lots of options and a good value. We will keep this as our catch-all / all-purpose set and will pass along our smaller Craftsman set to a family member.
title: Decent value in a new brand

It is not professional quality, but its exactly what most of the population would need.  Would recommend!
title: Dream First Time Tool Set

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: When I got married 20 years ago my wife gave me a nice set of tools from a good brand.  Over the years I've lost a socket and wrench or two and needed a new set.This is so much cheaper I didn't expect it to be a real alternative, but it's a really nice set.  The ratchets and pliers are very very similar to my old set, all the chrome looks great, the tools feel like top of the line tools, and the box is an easy way to have ready access to my tools.  I don't even use my 'nice' tools anymore.The range of wrench sizes isn't great for some automotive uses, but for 99% of things you would need a socket wrench for, this works, and the sockets are the kind that contact between sides rather than on corners, and are less likely to strip a nut.  The ratchets have an exposed lever, and you could break that if you dropped it, but that's pretty common and the action is very strong.  I imagine these tools will be in great condition in 20 years.  All the normal details, the rounded handles for saving hands, the way things are labeled, they are all really good.The case is also not that hard to open (sometimes the clips on these plastic boxes are stubborn, but not here).  It isn't 'light' but it's easy for most to carry around and while this isn't as 'cool' as a big steel toolbox, it keeps your tools organized forever so I love the plastic case.  It's also very tough, and easy to wipe clean.You do get a ton of screwdrivers and hex driver bits, enough for a lot of tasks, and the screwdrivers have strong magnets on the tips.All in all the price of this set is great for a nice set of tools.  You can definitely get cheaper plastic cases of cheapo tools, but these are tools you can keep for your life, maybe adding a few larger wrenches and a cordless screwdriver and something that cuts wood to have a basic setup for a homeowner or someone who maintains their own car.  I can't underline enough how impressed I am with the value.
title: Tough tools appropriate for a garage, equal to a 'good' brand

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: Amazon's Denali Brand 170 piece all purpose tool kit and socket set is a fairly basic but comprehensive ratchet, wrench, and socket set.  I've owned any number of socket sets over the years; this is definitely in the mid range unlike a Craftsman or Milwaukee; solid, but nothing that I'd argue is exceptional.  This shows up oddly enough more in the accessories like the screwdrivers and pliers rather than the sockets, which are generally good (and do at least go down to smaller sizes); I honestly will use other Amazon Basic pliers over these.  I also really don't like the case; I don't feel like the sockets are all that secure, and the latches do feel like it would take very little to break them off.  All in, not a bad set for the price, but you can do better and if you're using a set every day this probably isn't the one.  4 stars.
title: Good all purpose socket and wrench set

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: I like to keep some different tools handy while traveling. I’ve had random loose battery connections, the need to change out a battery all together, the need to change out headlight bulbs, and several other things as well. This set has tools that will cover the majority of any automotive needs that you would care to do on the side of the road or in a parking lot. This set includes a mix of metric and standard sockets and wrenches in many of the most common sizes. If all else fails, this set has a needle nose pliers, an adjustable wrench, and a tongue and groove pliers as well. This set won’t give you the ability to change out a tire, but most cars come with a tire iron that matches the lug nut size on their vehicle anyways. All of this said, a set like this is good for other uses beyond automotive. This will be my use for it, but this is because I appreciate how this set includes pretty much every potentially needed tool in one case. I have many of these tools separately, but now I don’t have to gather the tools from all over my garage or listen to them as they clink together while I’m driving down the road. I’m happy with the overall quality of the set as well. All of the tools look to be well made, precise, and capable to do the job. The case is solid as well, and there is also a foam piece included to keep all the sockets in place (This isn’t meant to be thrown away). Nicely thought out set!
title: Fairly exhaustive mechanics tool set

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text:
At first glance, I thought this 170 piece tool kit looked nearly identical to the $99 
  
180 piece offering from Crescent







  
  
    . However there are some differences that actually make the less expensive Crescent a better choice in my opinion:1. All the sockets included with the Crescent are 6 point sockets. All the Denali sockets are 12 point except the 3/8" drive deep sockets and the 1/4" drive sockets.2 The Denali includes a 1/2 ratchet and 10 1/2" drive sockets. The Crescent set does not include any 1/2" drive tools. Instead it includes deep 1/4" drive sockets.3. The 3/8" ratchet with the Crescent set is longer and better made than the one included in the Denali set.4. Crescent box end wrenches have the brand stamped in the wrench. Denali wrenches have their brand laser etched in. Not a big deal but it makes the Crescent wrenches look a bit more professional.5. Pliers are what made Crescent a household name in tools but in this set the Denali pliers are superior to the ones in the Crescent set.My brother-in-law has a Crescent set very similar to this that he's had since the 90s. I always liked the quality of the tools but thought the case design was just stupid. Hard to believe they're still making it the same unhandy way. I can see too, that like his, these latches will soon break. The latches on top are under a fixed handle, so it's hard to open them. So, there is a temptation not to latch these if you just leave the case sitting on the work bench. Then the latches can easily get folded inside when the case is closed. You set something onto of the case and bam: you just broke a latch. The case for the 150 piece set has way too much wasted space. There's no logical reason for leaving so much space between the sockets in the row. The only explanation I can come up with is that the case that is used for the 180 piece set has the same outside dimensions as this one (but adds deep sockets to the mix). So when they ship both to stores, they make packaging easier. Enough said. Just a terrible case design.I actually own the 
  
Crescent 150 piece set.







  
  
     (Currently only $3 less that the 180 piece set). The pictures with my review show some tools from that set.
title: Denali vs Crescent

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: Das schöne an Werkzeug ist, das es bei entsprechender Qualität und Pflege ein Handwerker:innen Leben hält.Auf der anderen Seite braucht niemand Profi Equipment, wenn er/sie nur gelegentlich zum Schraubenschlüssel greift. Denn neben der Qualität ist die Preisspanne für Werkzeug teilweise immens.Beim hier angebotenen 142-teiligen Mechaniker-Werkzeug- und Steckschlüssel-Set, der Amazon eigenen Marke  Denali, gibt bereits der Preis von aktuell 48,74€ (07/22) ein Indiz darauf, dass es sich eher um ein Angebot für gelegentliche Anwendung handelt und nicht um ein Set das Profis tagtäglich für mehrere Stunden in den Händen halten. Da braucht man sich einfach nichts vormachen und auf vermeintliches Schnäppchen hoffen, denn für den Preis gibt es vielleicht einen einzelnen Ringmaulschlüssel aus dem Profi-Bereich. Aber wer möchte schon hunderte von Euros investieren, wenn das gute Werkzeug dann die meiste Zeit in einer dunklen Kellerecke sein Dasein fristet.Wie bei den meisten Amazon Marken ist die Produktbeschreibung ausführlich und die Produkt Bilder aussagekräftig. In Kombination mit den bisherigen Rezension bekommen Kaufinteressent:innen ein sehr gutes Bild von dem für und Wider dieses Sets. Festhalten lässt sich, dass gerade die kleineren Größen durchaus gebräuchlich sind. Hier stimmt die Dimensionierung und das mögliche Drehmoment über ein. Kommt man jedoch zu den größeren Nüssen gerät dieses Gleichgewicht ins Wanken. Gerade bei fest sitzenden Verschraubungen kann das schief gehen. Das restliche Zubehör (Innensechskant, Bits, etc.) sind für einfachere Arbeiten auch zu gebrauchen. Die Bits sind aber ebenfalls nicht für Dauerbelastungen ausgelegt (recht weich).Der Koffer verströmt zu Beginn einen intensiven, chemischen Geruch, so dass ich ihn zunächst in der Garage deponiert habe. Nach 1 Woche war dieser aber fast gänzlich verflogen. Der Koffer ist als Behältnis okay, würde aber beim robusten Umgang auf der Baustelle oder in der Werkstatt an seine Grenzen stoßen.Fazit ➡️Halten wir uns nochmal den Preis vor Augen dann ist hier natürlich kein Jammern angebracht. Profis und ambitionierte Heimwerker:innen werden von vornherein zu anderen Produkten greifen. Wer aber in absehbarer Zeit nicht in den DIY-Projektkosmos einsteigen möchte und dennoch gerne ein kleines „Notfall-Set“ für den Hauhalt sucht, der ist hier gut bedient. Sobald die Schraube oder Mutter aber signifikante Gegenwehr leistet und ohnehin ein größere Kaliber ist, empfiehlt es sich zu anderen Werkzeug zu greifen. Unter Berücksichtigung dieser Aspekte würde ich 4/5 Sterne geben.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ (für gelegentliche Nutzung)
title: 🧰🪛🔧 Ein Koffer mit vielen Teilen für die Nutzung in Einzelfällen. Nichts für längere Projekte

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: This is supplied in a cardboard box measuring 508 x 373 x 127mm within which is the actual Denali 142 piece tool kit in a rugged plastic case measuring 483 x 360 x 98mm. Opening it up there are spanners, sockets, Allen Keys, ratchets and extensions, along with a screwdriver set, Most of these are in both metric and imperial sizes so that odd nut or bolt on your old car might have a solution straight out of this box.I have already used this set for multiple jobs, cleaned the brakes on the car, replaced the gas lift on my office chair, disassembled and reassembled a desk when decorating, and overall I have found it excellent. The parts seem well made and finished and the packing in the case itself is solid so less chance of things falling out when moving it around. If I have one comment to make it is that the ratchets seem short in length – I have an old one that is twice the size of the longest one provided and when you need to move something that has been locked in place for  awhile, you need that extra torque.Overall a great price for a comprehensive set – time will tell if these tools are  fully hardened or a little softer – but for my use they fit the bill perfectly.

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: .Amazon-Marke: Denali 142-teiliges Mechaniker-Werkzeug- und Steckschlüssel-Setbestellt: Do. 14. April 2022geliefert: Di. 19. April 2022 (mit Amazon Logistics).zum Zeitpunkt meiner Rezension betrug der Preis 60,63 €..Die meisten Informationen erhält man ja bereits, wenn man sich den Text und die Bilder in der Amazon-Produktbeschreibung anschaut, und die Rezensionen meiner Produkttester- Kolleginnen und Kollegen liest. Es macht sicher wenig Sinn, hier alles zu wiederholen. Deshalb nur noch einige ergänzende Daten, und vor allem meine persönliche Meinung:..Auf den ersten Blick fällt bereits auf,es besteht ein grobes "Miss-Verhältnis“ zwischen den zierlichen Ratschen auf der einen Seite,und den teilweise "großkalibrigen“ Sechskant-Stecknüssen auf der anderen Seite..Mit der kleinen (¼ Zoll)-Ratsche, in Verbindung mit den großen Stecknüssen von mehr als 10mm,kann man zwar Schrauben und Muttern drehen, aber keinesfalls lösen oder festziehen.Damit ist die Ratsche völlig überfordert..Für die größere (3/8 Zoll)-Ratsche gilt im Prinzip das gleiche:Stecknüsse von mehr als 17mm, drehen "Ja“, lösen oder festziehen "Nein“..Ich finde es deshalb nicht gut, dass für die ¼ Zoll-Ratsche, Stecknüsse bis 14mm,und für die 3/8 Zoll-Ratsche, Stecknüsse bis ca 22mm (= die 7/8 Zoll Nuss) dabei sind,ohne dass geeignetes Werkzeug zum lösen oder festziehen vorhanden ist..Man braucht für solche Größen einen sogenannten "T-Gleitgriff“ --(auch “Knebel“ genannt).Damit kann man dann gefahrlos hohe Kräfte auf die entsprechenden Verschraubungen ausüben,ohne das Risiko, die schönen Knarren zu zerstören – und sich im schlimmsten Fall dabei sogar noch die Finger zu verletzen..In vielen Werkzeug-Koffern ist so ein  "T-Gleitgriff“ mit dabei – eben um die empfindlichen, rel. teuren Ratschen zu schonen.Hier aber leider nicht..Wenn das aus Platz-Gründen im vorliegenden Koffer nicht geht, sollte man so kosequent sein,und die 3 - 4 jeweils größten Stecknüsse pro Ratsche weglassen.Da könnte man dann sogar noch den Preis um 5 - 10 Euro reduzieren..So wie der Koffer derzeit bestückt ist, stellt er für "Anfänger“ eine nicht zu unterschätzende Gefahr dar..Man stelle sich nur mal vor, was passieren könnte, wenn jemand in einem engen Motorraum, umgeben von harten, zum Teil scharfkantigen Metall- und Kunststoff-Teilen, gerade mit größter Kraft-Anstrengung eine festsitzende Schraube zu lösen versucht, und plötzlich ohne Vorwarnung die – für diese Aufgabe völlig unterdimensionierte – Ratsche nachgibt. Da kann man nur hoffen, dass der Auto-Bastler wenigstens schützende Handschuhe trug..Für versierte Schrauber gilt das natürlich nicht.Die wissen, dass eine normale Ratsche nicht zum Übertragen hoher Kräfte gebaut ist.Und die können natürlich -(hoffentlich)- abschätzen, wie stark sie die jeweilige Ratsche belasten können – oder sie lassen es bewusst "drauf ankommen“..Aber es ist eben durchaus eine Gefahr für unbedarfte Auto- oder Motorrad-Bastler-Neulinge..Und gerade die werden sich ja am ehesten so einen billigen "Komplett-Satz“ kaufen,in dem irrigen Glauben, dass sie mit dem Kauf des Koffers alles erworben haben, was man zur Auto- und Motorrad-Schrauberei benötigt, und dass sie nun sofort richtig loslegen können....Man könnte natürlich auch stundenlang darüber streiten, ob so ein "Komplett-Satz“ überhaupt Sinn macht..Wer zB. nie an englischen Autos, Motorrädern oder Maschinen schraubt, für den sind all die schönen Zoll-Steckschlüssel schon mal völlig nutzlos.Und auch so manches andere Teil wird von den meisten Käufern wohl nie angerührt werden..Wäre es da nicht eigentlich klüger, man kauft sich ganz gezielt nur die Teile, die man tatsächlich braucht – diese dann aber in hochwertiger Marken-Qualität ?Es muss ja nicht immer gleich Hazet oder Gedore sein.Es gibt genügend anderes gutes Marken-Werkzeug, das nicht fast "in Gold aufgewogen“ wird.(Wobei es von Gedore inzwischen auch schon Billig-Varianten gibt) ..Ich will hier aber keinen zukünftigen Hobby-Schrauber von seinem Plan abbringen, sich doch so einen Koffer zu kaufen – es sieht ja auch "cool“ aus.An sich ist der hier vorliegende Werkzeug-Koffer auch gar nicht so übel – wenn man die Teile wirklich braucht, die da drin sind..Und kleinere Steck-Nüsse kann man mit den Ratschen ja auch bedenkenlos benutzen. Wenn's sein muss auch zum lösen oder festziehen von Schrauben und Muttern.Aber eben nicht solche großen "Kaliber“ wie 7/8 Zoll Nuss, oder auch die 19mm Nuss mit der 3/8 Zoll-Ratsche,und nicht mehr als 10 mm mit der kleinen ¼ Zoll-Ratsche.Sonst blutet jedem echten Hobby-Schrauber das Herz, wenn die Ratschen sooo gequält werden.(und dem unerfahrenen Auto-Bastler- Neuling eventuell die Finger)..MfG.
title: netter Werkzeug-Koffer für Anfänger und Gelegenheits-Schrauber – aber teilweise unglücklich sortiert

text: Das Werkzeugset von der Marke DENALI, hier das 142-teilige Set im Koffer, kommt gut verpackt bei uns an. In dem Koffer hat jedes Werkzeug seinen Platz. So kann ich an meiner alten BMW und mein Kumpel an seiner Triumph herumschrauben – so hatten wir uns das Ganze auch gedacht.Fazit:Das Werkzeugset von der Marke DENALI, hier das 142-teilige Set im Koffer, ist in seiner Zusammenstellung und seiner Qualität genau das Richtige für unsere älteren Maschinen. Es ist immer etwas zu muckeln und so haben wir „hoffentlich“ immer das richtige Werkzeug in einem Koffer zusammen und griffbereit. product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: This 142-piece spanner, socket, and bit and hex-key set is extremely comprehensive.  I have several socket and bit sets and some spanners but compared to this kit, they all look very amateur.  With both emperial and metric components, this set really is comprehensive!  It's the only set you'll need for almost all applications.  The carry case is very sturdy and unlike almost every other plastic carry case that I've seen, this case actually holds all of the components in place, such that they don't go everywhere the second you open it.  The ratchet tools are good (with a high number of teeth) but the 1/4" driver handle could have been made better.  The chromium vanadium steel is extremely shiny and hardened.  Although Denali is not a brand that I've ever heard of, the quality of the components here are brilliant.
title: Superb quality and comprehensive socket and spanner set with hex keys and driver bits

     Kit de herramientas.🛠🔧🔩En el paquete se incluye dentro de una caja de cartón , el maletín  , con 142 piezas en el interior. En la caja hay una pegatina que se indica que están fabricadas en China.📝La caja es muy grande y pesada, 😥para no moverla mucho vamos. Vienen muchísimas herramientas, el cierre es con una palanca de plástico ,al igual que todo en maletín, que cumple bien su misión , es seguro y fuerte.👍🏽Cuando se abre, todas las piezas están bien colocadas y encajadas,🥰 no se caen al abrirse, las llaves de vaso por un lado, las fijas por otro, los acoples y reducciones, llaves allen, todo, y con marcas de la medida tanto en el estuche como en la propia pieza.😀Vienen dos llaves de carraca que se aprecian fuertes y bien construidas, aunque el mango es algo fino y no es ergonómico por si hubiera que hacer fuerza sobre un tornillo no es de lo más cómodo.😭El resto se ve resistente y de buena calidad, he usado varias incluso forzando un poco, y no se deforman, no sufren el esfuerzo, ni las de tubo, ni las puntas de destornillador. De calidad andan bastante bien.🤩Aunque vienen 142 piezas, para el uso que yo le doy me faltan llaves de varias medidas, y algunas que me gusta usarlas con la carreñaca que no se puede, como las Allen.😫Por otro lado  trae muchas llaves con medidas en pulgadas y esas yo no las uso apenas, y sin embargo de las que vienen en métrica, por ejemplo llaves fijas sólo hay 5. Las de vaso igual, hay un montón que no voy a utilizar casi nunca, y las allen vienen dos estuches, de los que uno de los nunca me ha hecho falta.🤔Concluyo recomendando el producto a personas que usen llaves en mm o el pulgadas habitualmente, y lo valoro con 4 estrellas por la calidad y la variedad que tienen ,pero por otro lado , no las recomiendo para un bricolaje, reparaciones de bicis o domésticas aquí en España, las llaves en pulgadas casi no se usan y tienes una maleta que pesa un quintal y no le das utilidad.⭐⭐⭐⭐
title: La caja viene muy completa, viene muchísimas piezas, pero para mi uso me sobran la mitad...😪

text: 車両整備やボルトナット止めの設備管理等なら、これだけ種類がありますと対応できないボルトサイズはないのではないかと思えるほどのセットです。モンキーやモーターレンチを加えれば、初心者の道具としては一式そろったと言えるのではないでしょうか。ソケットについての精度は「まぁ、普通」のレベル。六角レンチについては、小さいほどぴったり吸い付くとは言いづらい感じです。

text: 計170点の工具が入っています、一通りの工具がセットになって、日曜大工には、必要十分な、工具が揃っていて便利です、使用後、元の場所に戻す時、間違えないかな？と心配する位の種類があります。

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: * This is an impressive and comprehensive tool kit for nuts, bolts, and Allen sockets.* Sockets, keys, ring and open-ended spanners, all are supplied in both metric and imperial sizes.* There are ratchet handles in 1/4” and 3/8” square drive sizes. I could wish for these to have rubberised grips but that’s a petty gripe.* The moulded case is of good quality with a secure-feeling handle and reliable latches.* Weighing over 15 pounds the kit is not exactly handy but is a welcome resource in the shed or workshop.* Reasonably priced for what is offered, I cannot hesitate to rate the Denali 142-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set as five star.
title: Comprehensive Kit

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: ソケット、レンチ、六角レンチなどが、なんと142点も入っています。それなりに重たく大きいボリューム満点の工具セット。これがあれば修理やメンテナンスに十分機能を発揮してくれます。

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: This socket set is all fitted in a customised high impact plastic case with two plastic clasps for opening. This set is absolutely huge in the number of pieces it has and should satisfy anyone who needs a socket, a wrench, an Allen key, or a set of screwdriver bits .This case is slimline but well padded inside so that you can put your hands on whatever you are looking for. Items are individually marked with their size, so there is no need to just keep trying items until you find one that fits because you can go straight to the right one. An excellent tool accesory kit that will scratch so many itches for you! Good value!
title: A great socket set!

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: Il kit di attrezzi meccanici della Denali è arrivato all’interno della classica scatola in cartone di Amazon, ben imballato e privo di danni dovuti al trasporto.Gli attrezzi erano a loro volta inseriti all’interno di una valigetta rigida molto utile per tenerli tutti ordinati e a portata di mano. Nel dettaglio, il kit include, oltre alla valigetta, 1 manica a cricchetto a 72 denti da 9,52 mm, 1 manica di estensione da 152,4 mm x 9,52 mm, 1 adattatore da 9,52 mm x 6,35 mm, 1 manica universale per giunto cardanico da 9,52 mm, 1 chiave svitacandele da 15,8 mm, 20 bussole a 6 punte da 9,52 mm, 9 bussole profonde a 6 punte da 9,52 mm, 1 manica a cricchetto a 72 denti da 6,35 mm, 19 bussole a 6 punte da 6,35 mm, 10 bussole profonde a 6 punte da 6,35 mm, 1 manica di estensione da 152,4 mm x 6,35 mm, 1 giunto universale da 6,35 mm, 1 adattatore da 6,35 mm x 9,52 mm, 10 chiavi inglesi combinate, 15 punte per dadi da 3,96 mm, 28 chiavi a brugola metriche/SAE esagonali e un set da 22 punte.Personalmente, ho deciso di provare questo kit perché mi sono da poco trasferito e sto pian piano acquistando i vari attrezzi che possono essermi utili nelle situazioni più disparate, considerando anche il fatto che amo molto cimentarmi in lavori e riparazioni di ogni genere. Per questo, ho visto in questo set da 142 pezzi una buona opportunità per arricchire il mio arsenale visto che comprende la maggior parte degli attrezzi che si utilizzano comunemente in casa per piccoli lavori, lavori di meccanica e molto altro. Una volta ricevuta la valigetta, ho potuto constatare che tutto quello che era riportato in descrizione era presente e anche la qualità risulta davvero elevata visto che si tratta di strumenti che si possono anche utilizzare in ambito professionale. Il materiale con cui sono realizzate le parti metalliche degli attrezzi è il Cr-V, una variante dell’acciaio più forte e durevole. I colori prevalenti in questo set sono il nero e il verde che, in tutta onestà, trovo particolarmente adatti per articoli di questo genere. Su ogni attrezzo e sopra al suo alloggio dedicato all’interno della custodia sono riportate le misure in modo tale da poter tenere sempre tutto in ordine e avere subito a disposizione l’attrezzo di cui si ha bisogno.In conclusione, sono davvero felice di aver avuto l’opportunità di testare questo set di attrezzi. Il prezzo, di circa 64 euro al momento della recensione, lo trovo adeguato alla qualità offerta e al numero di pezzi e, anche per questi motivi sento di poterlo consigliare tranquillamente agli appassionati di meccanica e, perché no, anche ai professionisti.
title: Un kit di attrezzi meccanici perfetto per gli appassionati e professionisti

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: 内容のセット半分くらいがインチなので、ミリを求めている方向きではありません。（黒いスポンジの上に置いたのがインチ規格）1/4ラチェット4  5  5.5  6  7  8  9  10  11  12  133/86  7  8  9  10  12  13  14  15  16  17  18  19  201/215  17  18  19  21ディープ　12  13  14  15  16  17全部網羅しているようでいて、日本のクルマで使うなら6  8  10  12  （13）  14  17  19  21程度でしょうし、23  27  29  33などは今度はインパクトソケット向きなので手工具としては必要無いですし。。。（facomの1/2エクステンションラチェットみたいなラチェットとしては異端な強度を誇るヤツ専用です）しっかりとトルクをかけたいメガネレンチが8  10  12  13  14  15なのでそこは17  19  21を入れとけよ。。。って気持ちです。DIYでお世話になるかたが多そうなモンキーレンチですが、顎がガッタガタなうえ、メッキなので使わないほうがいいですね。。。モンキーはどの大きさにも合わせられますが、ガタガタで角を舐めやすいので一流工具メーカー品でもロクな物がありません。ロクなものが無いところへきてこのモンキーはもう怪我するから使わない方がいいレベルです。荒削りの面にメッキが掛かっていますが、工具はなにもカッコよくて光らせているわけではありません。削って削って鏡面仕上げをする事によって表面の傷を無くし、チカラを込めたときに傷がヒビや割れの原因にならないように均一にならし鏡面仕上げとしているわけです。対してこの荒削り面には沢山の傷が残ったままで割れの原因になるばかりか、荒い下地を隠すために載せたメッキがチカラを込めたときに基材とメッキの弾性の違いから剥がれて手に刺さる事すらあるわけです。メッキは薄い金属の膜ですのでカッターナイフ並みには切れますよ？なのでこの仕上げの違いからして、工具に対する「鏡面にする」意味を履き違えているわけです。実際セットの中には剥がれたメッキが所々落ちていました。こんなん素足で踏んだら血ぃでますよ。なのでコレをおすすめできるのは手っ取り早くインチ規格の工具が欲しい人向けでしょうか。私なら+¥4000ですが、WERAの3/8セットをおすすめします。。。
title: ※注意※ 半分インチ規格

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: Splendida valigetta contenente decine e decine di utensili di ottima fattura indispensabili per il fai da te, diciamo quelli da tenere sempre a portata di mano: sono rimasto molto soddisfatto da questo prodotto che ha superato le mie aspettative.📦 UnboxingIl set è arrivato in perfette condizioni all'interno della propria confezione originale; quest'ultima è molto bella da vedere e rappresenta una bella idea regalo per gli appassionati del genere. Dopo aver completato l'unboxing ho notato che ogni strumento era perfettamente custodito nel proprio alloggiamento all'interno della valigetta e non presentava segni di usura, graffi superficiali o difetti di fabbricazione.🛠️ UtilizzoDurante l'utilizzo questi strumenti si nono dimostrati all'altezza di tanti altri già in mio possesso ma prodotti da brand più famosi e certamente più costosi. Mi hanno colpito soprattutto le chiavi esagonali che hanno tutta l'aria di essere solide e durature nel tempo. L'inclusione della valigetta è un altro aspetto fondamentale da tenere in considerazione per chi cerca strumenti di questo genere e, come me, non ha un banco di lavoro adeguato dove riporli (oltre che ne facilita notevolmente il trasporto).👉 ConcludendoUn gran bel set, che consiglio a tutti quelli che cercano delle chiavi esagonali di ottima qualità e che una volta che ci sono vogliono portare a casa tantissimi altri strumenti indispensabili per il fai da te.
title: Set completo e versatile

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: Come la stragrande maggioranza delle persone mi diletto in casa in piccoli lavoretti, anche se a dire la verità non è la cosa che mi riesce meglio in assoluto :)Quando si fanno certi lavori avere l'attrezzo giusto è fondamentale, e grazie a questa valigetta di 142 attrezzi a marchio Denali (brand diretto Amazon) non ci troveremo mai più in crisi davanti ad una vcite da svitare, un dado da smollare o una brugola da fissare.La valigetta è (ovviamente) molto pesante, si apre a libro e all'interno è tutto organizzato benissimo e fissato in spazi dedicati.Materiale lega di acciaio al cromo vanadio, un classico utilizzato in questa tipologia di attrezzi.Presente anche due mitiche chiavi a cricchetto che funzionano davvero beneOgni elemento ha la sua sede nella valigetta, per tenere sempre tutto in ordine e oltre a chiavi e bussole ci sono brugole, torx ed inserti per cacciavite a stella e a taglio.Insomma, un set davvero davvero completo, forse non comodissimo da portarsi in giro per casa ma che permetterà davvero di non trovarsi mati davanti a qualcosa che non si sa come avvitare o svitare!Prezzo al momento del mio test (aprile maggio 2022) di 49 euro, una cifra che ritengo più che ragionevole per la qualità degli attrezzi contenutiL'articolo mi è stato fornito gratuitamente all'interno del programma Amazon Vine.In cambio mi si chiede di effettuare una recensione onesta, imparziale e basata sull'esperienza d'uso effettiva.E così cerco sempre di fare.Né il produttore dell'articolo né tanto meno Amazon contattano o influenzano le voci Vine nelle recensioni.
title: Set di attrezzi davvero interessante, perfetto per un uso non professionale!

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: Il packaging è del tutto trascurabile, la valigetta in sé costituisce un eccellente involucro durevole nel tempo.I pezzi sono disposti in maniera ordinata e razionale nella valigetta e non hanno la fastidiosa tendenza a uscire dalla propria sede mescolandosi tra loro (prestate solo attenzione a incastrarli bene quando li riponete).Ho testato bussole, brugole, punte a stella e inserti a snodo (superlativi...credetemi) e devo riconoscere che nessuno di questi prodotti si è deformato (e non ha nemmeno deformato le viti oggetto del lavoro) segno di un'ottima qualità costruttiva e dell'impiego di materiali tutt'altro che economici.Al momento in cui scrivo, entrambe le versioni della valigetta (si differenziano per quantità di pezzi) vengono proposte a prezzi talmente aggressivi da poter mettere in imbarazzo anche i marchi più blasonati (che, mediamente, offrono un livello qualitàtivo paragonabile a questo).Per quanto mi riguarda, questo kit è promosso a pieni voti con tanto di lode e si guadagna una strameritata quinta stella🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
title: Molto, molto bene!

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: El maletín es robusto, los cierres son fuertes. Cuando lo abrimos, todas las herramientas que están muy bien fijadas permanecen en su sitio, incluso las de la tapa de arriba. En total tenemos 142 piezas.La calidad de las herramientas es buena, están fabricadas en aleación de acero cromo vanadio endurecido, pero no deberíamos de pensar en ellas para uso profesional, más bien para bricolaje y uso doméstico. Como comento antes, son de buena calidad, pero no llegan a calidad “premium”.
title: Maletín herramientas

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: Kit de herramientas mecánicas.Actualmente por un precio de 67€.✅ El kit se compone de un maletín grande y robusto, con 142 piezas. Entre estas encontramos vasos, llaves, llaves hexagonales y otras herramientas esenciales. Fabricadas con una aleación de acero de cromo vanadio endurecido (Cr-V). Con sistema de engranaje de 72 dientes. En total el estuche mide 48,3 x 36 x 9,8 cm.✅ En sí el maletín está completísimo y se ve de calidad. Hay MUCHÍSIMAS piezas, mi padre es albañil y ha filpado... no voy a decir que sobren (porque ni él piensa así) pero desde luego es para un público MUY concreto, que trabaje directamente con muchas medidas distintas de vasos /llaves.
title: Completísimo y de calidad

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: Hola a todos y a todas, este producto se trata de un maletín de herramientas. Está compuesto por un total de 142 elementos, entre los que caben destacar entre otros las llaves Allen, un destornillador con diversas cabezas, llaves de vaso, fijas, de todo.He utilizado varias de ellas y se notan que no son las del Ikea de montar muebles, las cabezas no se les nota deterioro después de usarlas unas cuantas veces, y en algunas ocasiones forzando bastante porque algunas tuercas y tornillos estaban muy apretadas.En cuanto al propio maletín, está fabricado en un plástico duro y es bastante grande y pesada, las piezas están totalmente seguras en él, además de que el cierre funciona correctamente.
title: No se deterioran aunque las tuercas o tornillos estén muy apretados

product: Amazon Brand - Denali 170-Piece All-Purpose Tool Kit and Socket Set
text: Non è per elogiare il marchio che è di amazon, ma questo set è veramente ben fatto!Non vi elenco i 144 pezzi perchè li trovate nella descrizione ma vi posso assicurare che il prodotto è di ottima qualità , belli robusti e pesanti, una cromatura lucida impeccabile.Ogni set ha il numero stampato in valigetta , dove non potremo sbagliare la chiave da prendere e da rimettere.Ci sono anche torks e cacciaviti oltre che le brugole.La valigetta in plastica , di qualità media , è comunque ben fatta con cerniere di chiusura .È un set completo a prezzo modico che vi permetterà di avere tutti gli attrezzi in pochissimo spazio , e potrete portarli con voi grazie alla comoda valigetta a maniglia.

text: Non è per elogiare il marchio che è di amazon, ma questo set è veramente ben fatto!Non vi elenco i 144 pezzi perchè li trovate nella descrizione ma vi posso assicurare che il prodotto è di ottima qualità , belli robusti e pesanti, una cromatura lucida impeccabile.Ogni set ha il numero stampato in valigetta , dove non potremo sbagliare la chiave da prendere e da rimettere.Ci sono anche torks e cacciaviti oltre che le brugole.La valigetta in plastica , di qualità media , è comunque ben fatta con cerniere di chiusura .È un set completo a prezzo modico che vi permetterà di avere tutti gli attrezzi in pochissimo spazio , e potrete portarli con voi grazie alla comoda valigetta a maniglia.
title: Set stupendo in scatola enorme !
